heading: HB07950
0: AN ACT EMPOWERING THE PHILIPPINE INSTITUTE OF TRADITIONAL AND COMPLEMENTARY HEALTH CARE BY VESTING UPON IT REGULATORY POWERS, PROVIDING IT WITH AUGMENTED HUMAN RESOURCES AND UPGRADED EQUIPMENT, ESTABLISHING TESTING LABORATORIES AND FIELD OFFICES, AMENDING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8423 AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07950
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EMPOWERING THE PHILIPPINE INSTITUTE OF TRADITIONAL AND COMPLEMENTARY HEALTH CARE BY VESTING UPON IT REGULATORY POWERS, PROVIDING IT WITH AUGMENTED HUMAN RESOURCES AND UPGRADED EQUIPMENT, ESTABLISHING TESTING LABORATORIES AND FIELD OFFICES, AMENDING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8423 AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide a wide, safe, effective, and cost-efficient health products and services for traditional and alternative health care industry. Provides PITCHC police and regulatory powers over the traditional and complementary health care industry to fully empower it to effectively discharge its mandate.
ALIAS NAME : “Philippine Institute of Traditional and Complementary Health Care (PITCHC) Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESTRELLA, CONRADO III M.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
